p: Nur is the number of use citations for each ailment category and Nt is the number of plant species used for the same ailment category by all the healers [ 20]. ICF ranged between 0 and 1. ICF value is higher (near to 1) when a few plant species are cited by a higher proportion of healers, indicating homogeneity of information about the usage of specific plants. A low value (close to 0) demonstrates the healersâ€™ disagreement about the usage of the plant for a particular ailment category [ 21].
